paragraph1: Hello, I'm Sergei, a software engineer with a passion for all things technology. I graduated from university with a degree in Railway Engineering, where I learned about electromechanics, which provided me with a solid foundation in problem-solving and technical skills.
paragraph2: In 2022, I decided to pursue a career in software engineering and completed the immersive program at Code Chrysalis, a coding bootcamp in Tokyo where I went through rigorous training to become a full-stack developer and honed my skills in JavaScript with Node, React/Next and other technologies.
paragraph3: As a trilingual individual who can speak Russian, English, and Japanese, I have good communication skills and can work effectively with a diverse team. I strongly believe that anything can be learned, and I am always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and skill set.
paragraph4: In addition to my software engineering work, I also like to tinker with hardware and explore the intersection between software and hardware. I find that this helps me to better understand the technical aspects of both fields, and I enjoy the creative problem-solving that comes with working on both hardware and software projects.
paragraph5: Outside of work, I enjoy making music and writing poetry as creative outlets. These hobbies allow me to step away from technology and engage with other parts of my brain, which helps me stay refreshed and focused when I return to my work. I am a lifelong learner who enjoys reading and discovering new things. I believe that the pursuit of knowledge is an ongoing process, and I strive to keep up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the industry.
paragraph6: Thank you for taking the time to learn a little about me. I'm excited about the future of technology and the role that I can play in shaping it.
